numlitem.para: (RB211 engines only) Associated Engine Start Valve is operative,
(RB211 engines only) Associated Engine Limiter Control (ELC) system is operative, and
Alternate procedures are established and used.
Manually hold start switch to GND position.
Release the start switch to AUTO at 51-52% N2 (P&W) or 47-49% N3 (RB211).

caution.para: DELAYING RELEASE OF THE START SWITCH CAN CAUSE STARTER OVERSPEED AND DAMAGE.

numlitem.para: Verify that the start valve light on the overhead panel momentarily illuminates, then extinguishes.

placard.para: Placard affected Starter Switch "HOLD COIL INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
